original_title: Che questo piano perfetto sia solo per lei
overview: Margherita, a young photographer meets her sister Caterina at a symbolic place of their childhood to give her important news. Right in the middle of the Piedmontâ€™s hills, the distance between them arises changing their lives forever.
tagline: Two sisters meet up in a symbolic place of their childhood. That's when their lives will change forever.
title: May the exquisite scheme be only for her
